description:
all: avoid leaking fds during tests

trivial: it is not a serious problem to leak a fd in a short lived process, but it was obscuring my investigation of issue 5593.

messages.text:
Thanks Ian. I found a few more this morning so I'll update this CL and
remail this evening.

On Wed, Jun 19, 2013 at 10:48 AM,  <iant@golang.org> wrote:
> LGTM
>
> https://codereview.appspot.com/10391043/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Ping.

I don't mind you submitting this, and then sending more CLs as you find
more.
